title: About
text:
|
Hi, I’m Kevin Hamakawa, a fourth-year student at UCLA majoring in Statistics and Data Science with a minor in Data Science Engineering.
I’m passionate about:
- Data Science
- Machine Learning
- The integration of technology into society
I am an enthusiastic problem solver who thrives in team environments and collaborating with others.

Professional Experience
I have experience working in data science and analytics within the entertainment industry and am excited to explore further opportunities in the field.
Feel free to connect with me through my homepage or LinkedIn.

title: Projects
text: This project explores various algorithms and methods to create effective text summaries using Natural Language Processing (NLP). The article dives into the challenges of summarization and provides insights into practical applications.

title: Projects
text:
Predicting the Madness of March
A predictive analytics project that leverages machine learning techniques to forecast the outcomes of March Madness games. The analysis combines historical data with advanced modeling approaches to improve prediction accuracy.

title: Projects
section: Exploring the Right Way to Play Wordle
text:
Exploring the Right Way to Play Wordle
This project investigates strategies for playing the popular game Wordle. Using data analysis and simulations, it examines optimal word choices and their impact on solving the puzzle efficiently.
